==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=姜|alt=䕬,姜,𦷗,𧅁}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
Originally as {{och-l|𧅁}} or {{och-l|䕬}}: {{Han compound|艸|alt1=艹|彊|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}}.

Note that the simplified form {{och-l|姜}} is also a traditional character on its own.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*kjaŋ||ginger}}.
